channel.title: Ip on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in Ip on Goofing Osamu

item.title: Logging Global IP address
item.description: Here is a memo over IP address and its logging. Local IP address Local IP address can be obtained by using ip addr. $ ip addr For processing this output with script, use of -o option is handy. Global IP address If a workstation is behind the firewall, Global IP address is that for the gateway device. Googling “what is my IP” gives lots of sites offering Global IP verification.
